```{r setup}
library(cpp)
library(tibble)
XY=data_xy(Dep.var ~ . -1, mydataset_noconst)
Y = as.matrix(XY$Y)
X = as.matrix(XY$X)

set.seed(1)
beta0 = rnorm(ncol(X))

tolerance=1e-3  # tolerance
maxit=1000      # max iteration, not to run forever
stepsize=1e-5 

GD_Cpp = betahat_GD_Cpp(beta0, X, Y, tolerance, maxit, stepsize)
GD_Cpp
```
